ygData.subject: ENOUGH!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Whatever, I personally don t care about your opinions. And I didn t mean to send that note out publicly. It was supposed to be just for him only. I didn t know

From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>

Whatever, I personally don't care about your opinions. And I didn't mean to 
send that note out publicly. It was supposed to be just for him only. I 
didn't know that the address was for the NBW O.K., so lay off, NOW!
If you don't like my posts, too bad. I'm playing by your rules, so there is 
no reason the complain about what i wrote. If i wanted, i could have done 
something worse, but i didn't beacue you all asked me not to do those sorts 
of things when i first came in.
So, if you don't like mine and Meg's ideas, i don't care. DON'T read them if 
you don't like them. I did nothing wrong to anyone, i didn't use bad 
language and i didn't do anything that would be considered wrong. These are 
robots for one, they have NO breasts or anything. how could this be real 
anyway? I've seen some of the stuff you guys write and it's pretty gross 
too, so what the @#$$ are you guys complaining about? I didn't raise 
complaints about any of that!
Two, it's called comic relief. Have you ever heard of humour?
So, i've had enough of your pointless whining. If you want to take this up, 
do it in private e-mail. My addy is:                        
beastwarsaddress@...





>     As much as I enjoy watching pointless arguments, this could drive 
>another
>wedge between people in the group.  We don't need that.  Alten, as amusing 
>as
>the post was, it went beyond the bounds of good taste.  From an objective
